about_the_game:
This is an open world game on 3D, also a mission centered survival battle game. It includes gameplay such as role-playing, tactical strategy, player cooperation, mission monster fighting, and experience upgrade. The game plot combines Wang Yangming's philosophy of the mind, learning Wang Yangming's sage thoughts while entertaining, and the philosophy of the mind is also known as the Dragon Way.

    The game has developed Dozens scenes and combat tasks, allowing players to gradually complete tasks and receive rewards such as coins, experience, and equipment. Players learn survival instincts while gradually improving their martial arts level and offensive and defensive abilities.

    The game has four player avatars, and players can choose the corresponding avatar according to their preferences when starting the game. The four characters include two female generals and two grand marshals, each of which is lifelike and unique, and is worth players to try out one by one. The game also supports multiplayer collaboration to fight monsters. Currently, it supports up to four people in online games, with one person as the main player and others as auxiliary players, allowing for teamwork and joint completion of combat tasks.

The background and plot of the story are as follows:

    Billions of years ago, there was a huge dragon tribe on Earth that originated in the Himalayas and lived in nearby areas. The mountains were high and lush, with abundant food chains and activity areas with significant altitude differences, which led to the early evolution of this dragon tribe. People called them "humanoid dragons". As humanoid dragons continued to migrate to the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, the Central Plains, and the Hangzhou Jiaxing Huzhou Plain, their bodies slowly stood up and eventually evolved into the first humans: Dragon Cloud and Dragon Cloud.

    In order to survive, Long Yun and Long Yun, as well as their descendants, gradually learned survival skills such as logging and fruit picking, medicinal and mining, hunting and fishing, and riding horses and boats. In order to survive better, humans constantly cut grass and wood to build grass houses and wooden fences, mine and iron to make agricultural tools and weapons. The residence has also been built from open-air group houses, with each unit consisting of rough grass houses to prevent wind and rain. I also learned how to make fire and roast animal meat from hunting and eating raw meat. Some tribes even used ropes to tie knots and count, planted rice water chestnuts, and produced planters, blacksmiths, pharmacists, and shamans for worship.

    The general trend of the world is that if it is divided for a long time, it will merge, and if it is merged for a long time, it will divide. As the saying goes, 'When things are extreme, they will reverse; when they are prosperous, they will decline.' This is the ultimate principle of heaven and earth, even if they are as powerful as the Tang Dynasty. In the Middle Ages, after the collapse of the Tang Dynasty, it ushered in the most chaotic and shortest period of "Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms" in history. The country was plagued by war and chaos, and the people were struggling. After years of mutual warfare and annexation, there were still eight political regimes left: Later Jin, Later Shu, Nanping, Later Chu, Southern Tang, Wu Yue, Dali, and Southern Han.

    Human beings were born to fight. In the Later Jin Dynasty, the cursed king had a vast territory and strong power, supported by the demonic forces led by the Eastern and Northern demonic sects, competing for power and fighting against the soldiers of the Kingdom of Pele. He defeated the soldiers of the Kingdom of Pele, imprisoned the Queen of Pele, and abducted the Little Prince Lett. The great hero Long Yun (Yun), who has traveled through the world, is the embodiment of the true dragon emperor Zhao Kuangyin. With the power of the "Five Emperors Dragon Fist" and a coiled dragon stick, he travels throughout China, constantly conquering cities and territories to uphold justice and cleanse evil, demonstrating his heroic qualities and completing one mission after another.

    I don't know who opened Pandora's Box and alarmed the demon race. The demon race, which had been sealed for thousands of years, smelled the fresh scent of human blood. For a moment, a demonic wind swept through the world, and various underworld ghosts, monsters, zombies, wooden corpses, ancient undead or ghosts appeared one after another. Especially at midnight, they hunted and killed humans in various dark mountains and forests, drank blood and breathed in. So, humans embarked on a game of killing and being killed with demons for thousands of years.

    Finally, on Earth, another massive dragon clan suddenly appeared in the sand dune area deep in the forest. This dragon tribe originated from the Jurassic dinosaur tribe in the vast ocean hundreds of millions of years ago, evolving from the depths of the ocean to shallow seas and coasts. They narrowly escaped the mass extinction caused by forest fires on Earth and have recently crossed the Great Wall to the Central Plains to fight against humans in order to survive. In order to take control of the universe and dominate the Central Plains, humans have organized themselves and elected you as their leader, thus engaging in a prolonged territorial struggle with this dinosaur tribe.

    What is the fate of humanity? What kind of changes will it bring to this world? Everything needs to be conquered to the fullest by the hero. Please embark on a new journey!

highlighted.name: Deer Island Lion Slaying and Skin Peeling
Making clothes by peeling rabbit skin
Steal horse and burn grain warehouses
Attack the outer castle and go home

name: DragonRoad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online play and product activation
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-14900HX 2.20 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX 4060 Laptop GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 80 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 12 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for online play and product activation

short_description: This is an open world game on 3D, Also a mission centered survival battle game. It includes role-playing, tactical strategy, experience upgrade.It has Dozens scenes and combat tasks, allowing players to complete tasks and receive rewards. It support multi people cooperation on network.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
